statements: SELECT * FROM content_engagement_metrics;
SELECT content_id, likes FROM content_engagement_metrics WHERE likes > 100;
SELECT content_id, shares, comments FROM content_engagement_metrics ORDER BY shares DESC;
SELECT content_id, comments FROM content_engagement_metrics WHERE comments < 50 ORDER BY content_id ASC;
SELECT SUM(likes) AS total_likes, SUM(shares) AS total_shares, SUM(comments) AS total_comments FROM content_engagement_metrics;
SELECT content_id, likes, shares, comments FROM content_engagement_metrics WHERE likes > 100 ORDER BY shares DESC;
SELECT content_id, likes, comments FROM content_engagement_metrics WHERE shares < 50 AND comments > 20;
SELECT content_id, shares, likes FROM content_engagement_metrics WHERE shares + likes > comments * 2;
SELECT content_id, likes, shares, comments FROM content_engagement_metrics ORDER BY likes DESC, shares ASC;
SELECT content_id, likes, shares FROM content_engagement_metrics WHERE likes >= 50 AND shares < 100 ORDER BY content_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM ContentMetrics WHERE id = 1;
SELECT title, body FROM Content WHERE publication_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM ContentMetrics WHERE likes > 100 ORDER BY shares DESC;
SELECT title, publication_date FROM Content WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT AVG(likes), MAX(shares) FROM ContentMetrics;
SELECT id, likes, shares FROM ContentMetrics WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM ContentMetrics WHERE likes > 100 ORDER BY shares DESC;
SELECT title, body FROM Content WHERE publication_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM ContentMetrics WHERE shares BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY id ASC, likes DESC;
SELECT id, comments FROM ContentMetrics WHERE content_id IN (SELECT id FROM Content WHERE title LIKE 'Amazing%');
SELECT * FROM user_engagement
SELECT content_id, likes, shares FROM content_performance
SELECT title, description FROM content_details
SELECT content_id, comments FROM content_performance
SELECT user_id, action_type, action_date FROM user_engagement
SELECT * FROM user_engagement WHERE action_type = 'like' ORDER BY action_date DESC;
SELECT u.user_id, u.action_type, c.title FROM user_engagement u JOIN content_details c ON u.content_id = c.content_id WHERE u.action_type = 'share';
SELECT c.title, cp.likes, cp.shares FROM content_details c JOIN content_performance cp ON c.content_id = cp.content_id WHERE cp.likes > 100 ORDER BY cp.likes DESC, cp.shares DESC;

SELECT u.user_id, c.title, cp.comments FROM user_engagement u JOIN content_details c ON u.content_id = c.content_id JOIN content_performance cp ON c.content_id = cp.content_id WHERE u.user_id = 12345;
SELECT c.topic, COUNT(*) AS total_actions FROM user_engagement u JOIN content_details c ON u.content_id = c.content_id GROUP BY c.topic HAVING total_actions > 5 ORDER BY total_actions DESC;
SELECT * FROM likes;
SELECT content, likes_count FROM posts WHERE id = 1;
SELECT user_id, post_id FROM comments ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT post_id, user_id FROM shares WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT id, post_id, user_id FROM likes WHERE post_id = 3;
SELECT id, post_id, user_id FROM likes WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT post_id, user_id, id FROM shares WHERE post_id = 3;
SELECT user_id, post_id, id FROM comments ORDER BY post_id ASC, user_id DESC;
SELECT id, content, likes_count, shares_count, comments_count FROM posts WHERE likes_count > 100 ORDER BY shares_count DESC;
SELECT id, post_id, user_id, comment_text FROM comments WHERE LENGTH(comment_text) > 50;
SELECT * FROM Content;
SELECT content_title, publish_date FROM Content ORDER BY publish_date DESC;
SELECT content_title, likes, shares FROM Content WHERE likes > 100 ORDER BY shares ASC;
SELECT username, email FROM Users WHERE location = 'New York' LIMIT 10;
SELECT content_title, comments FROM Content WHERE publish_date >= '2022-01-01' AND publish_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM Content WHERE likes > 100 ORDER BY publish_date DESC;
SELECT content_title, likes, shares FROM Content WHERE publish_date > '2021-01-01' AND likes < 50 ORDER BY content_title ASC;

SELECT c.content_title, u.username, l.like_date FROM Content c JOIN Likes l ON c.content_id = l.content_id JOIN Users u ON u.user_id = l.user_id WHERE u.location = 'New York' ORDER BY l.like_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_likes, content_id FROM Likes GROUP BY content_id HAVING total_likes > 10 ORDER BY total_likes DESC;

SELECT c.content_title, u.username, COUNT(comments) AS total_comments FROM Content c JOIN Comments com ON c.content_id = com.content_id JOIN Users u ON u.user_id = com.user_id GROUP BY c.content_title, u.username HAVING total_comments < 5 ORDER BY total_comments ASC;
